meanings.definition: A person who writes regularly on a blog or website.
meanings.sent1: The weblogger shared daily updates on their blog.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading posts from different webloggers online.
meanings.sent3: The weblogger joked about their cat's antics in a recent blog post.
meanings.sent4: She was a weblogger weaving stories into the digital tapestry of the internet.
meanings.sent5: The weblogger's words painted vivid pictures in the minds of their readers.

meanings.definition: To write and maintain a blog or website.
meanings.sent1: She decided to weblogger about her travels around the world.
meanings.sent2: Many people weblogger as a way to express their thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent3: He webloggered about his failed attempt at baking a cake.
meanings.sent4: The words webloggered onto the screen as she typed furiously.
meanings.sent5: They webloggered their way through the digital landscape, leaving a trail of posts behind.
